title: In the early Islamic world, did people believe in flying horses? - Quora

response.answer_text: Now and then. There is nothing strange about a flying horse. If you believe in supernatural world, then you don’t have a problem. If you believe in God, you believe He send messengers, and hence you believe He can give them whatever sort of transport as He wishes.
Yes. And when early muslims found Greek texts where the flying horse Pegasus are described in vivid detail and Roman mosaics depicting it, it probably helped to confirm that belief ;-)
